price: Dhugumatti, isaan (ergamaan) gara isaaniitti ergame ni gaafanna; ergamootas ni gaafanna.
arabic: فَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَنَسۡـَٔلَنَّ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: falanasalanna alladhīna ur'sila ilayhim walanasalanna al-mur'salīna
